content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Service Desk assignment group is responsible for:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Processing standard requests, which are to be covered to pass probation:\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Â \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://sharepoinepacom/project/epm-help/HD%20Hiring%20and%20Education%20program/List%20of%20requests%20to%20be%20covered%20to%20pass%20probatioaspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"link\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Answering FAQs on internal applications, such as PMC, UPSA, VTS, et\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gathering approvals and additional information before reassigning requests to other (responsible) services\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
